targets.rawSql: SELECT make FROM reporting.vehicle_information WHERE registration = '$registration_plate'
SELECT model from reporting.vehicle_information WHERE registration = '$registration_plate'
SELECT colour from reporting.vehicle_information WHERE registration = '$registration_plate'
SELECT fuel_type from reporting.vehicle_information WHERE registration = '$registration_plate'
SELECT CONCAT(engine_capacity_litres, 'L') as engine_capacity_litres from reporting.vehicle_information WHERE registration = '$registration_plate'
SELECT registration_date as registration_date from reporting.vehicle_information WHERE registration = '$registration_plate'

SELECT vi."registration", vmt."completed_date" as time, vmt."odometer_reading_in_miles" as mileage, vi."make", vi."model"
FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test AS vmt
INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_information vi on vmt."vehicle_information_id" = vi."id"
WHERE vi.registration = '$registration_plate' and $__timeFilter(vmt."completed_date")
ORDER BY vmt."completed_date" asc
SELECT mot_status_is_valid from reporting.vehicle_information WHERE registration = '$registration_plate'
SELECT tax_status_dvla_tax_status_text from reporting.vehicle_information WHERE registration = '$registration_plate'

SELECT result FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test vmt
INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_information vi on vi.id = vmt.vehicle_information_id
WHERE vi.registration = '$registration_plate'
ORDER BY vmt.completed_date DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
vmt.result,
vmt.test_number,
vmt.completed_date,
EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM DATE_TRUNC('year', vmt.completed_date)) as time
FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test vmt
INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_information vi on vi.id = vmt.vehicle_information_id
WHERE vi.registration = '$registration_plate'

SELECT vmt.completed_date AS "Test Date", vmt.result AS "MOT Result", vmt.odometer_reading_in_miles AS "Odometer (miles)", STRING_AGG('[' || vmtd.category || ']
' || vmidd.top_level_category || '
' || vmidd.defect_name ,'

' order by vmtd.category desc) AS "Defect Details" FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test vmt
INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_information vi on vi.id = vmt.vehicle_information_id
LEFT JOIN reporting.vehicle_mot_test_defect vmtd on vmtd.vehicle_mot_test_id = vmt.id
LEFT JOIN reporting.vehicle_mot_inspection_defect_definitions vmidd on vmidd.id = vmtd.defect_definition_id
WHERE vi.registration = '$registration_plate'
GROUP BY vmt.completed_date, vmt.result, vmt.odometer_reading_in_miles
ORDER BY vmt.completed_date DESC

SELECT vmt.completed_date as time,
       COUNT(CASE WHEN vmtd.category = 'advisory' THEN vmtd.category END) as "Advisory",
       COUNT(CASE WHEN vmtd.category = 'minor' THEN vmtd.category END) as "Minor",
       COUNT(CASE WHEN vmtd.category = 'major' THEN vmtd.category END) as "Major",
       COUNT(CASE WHEN vmtd.category not in('advisory', 'minor', 'major') THEN vmtd.category END) as "Other"
FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test_defect vmtd
         RIGHT JOIN reporting.vehicle_mot_test vmt on vmt.id = vmtd.vehicle_mot_test_id
         INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_information vi on vi.id = vmt.vehicle_information_id
WHERE vi.registration = '$registration_plate' and $__timeFilter(vmt."completed_date")
GROUP BY vmt.completed_date
ORDER BY vmt.completed_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(*), vmidd.top_level_category FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test_defect vmtd 
INNER JOIN (SELECT vmt.Id FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test vmt
                             INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_information vi on vi.id = vmt.vehicle_information_id
      WHERE vi.registration = '$registration_plate' AND vmt.result = 'failed'
      ORDER BY vmt.completed_date DESC
      LIMIT 1) vmt ON vmt.id = vmtd.vehicle_mot_test_id
    INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_mot_inspection_defect_definitions vmidd on vmidd.id = vmtd.defect_definition_id
--WHERE vmtd.category > 'advisory' maybe use distinct defect code so that all 4 corners of suspension arms don't skew results
GROUP BY vmidd.top_level_category

SELECT COUNT(vmidd."id"), CONCAT('(', regexp_replace(vmidd."top_level_category", '\d+\.\s+', ''), ') ', COALESCE(vmidd."sub_category_name", vmidd."category_area"))  
FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test_defect vmtd 
INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_mot_test vmt ON vmtd."vehicle_mot_test_id" = vmt."id"
INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_mot_inspection_defect_definitions vmidd ON vmtd."defect_definition_id" = vmidd."id"
INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_information vi ON vmt.vehicle_information_id = vi.id
WHERE vi.registration = '$registration_plate' AND vmtd."category" in ('dangerous', 'fail', 'major', 'minor')
GROUP BY vmidd."sub_category_name", vmidd."category_area", vmidd."top_level_category", vmt."result"
HAVING vmt."result" = 'failed'  AND vmidd."category_area" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY COUNT(vmidd."id") DESC

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(vmt.completed_date, '$__interval'),
       CONCAT('(', regexp_replace(vmidd."top_level_category", '\d+\.\s+', ''), ') ', COALESCE(vmidd."sub_category_name", vmidd."category_area")) as category,
       COUNT(*) as bucket
FROM reporting.vehicle_mot_test_defect vmtd
         INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_mot_test vmt ON vmtd."vehicle_mot_test_id" = vmt."id"
         INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_mot_inspection_defect_definitions vmidd ON vmtd."defect_definition_id" = vmidd."id"
         INNER JOIN reporting.vehicle_information vi ON vmt.vehicle_information_id = vi.id
WHERE vi.registration = '$registration_plate' 
  AND vmtd."category" not in ('advisory') 
  AND vmt."result" = 'failed' 
GROUP BY vmt.completed_date, vmidd.top_level_category, vmidd.sub_category_name, vmidd.category_area

list.description: Registration plate to search metrics for
list.label: Registration Plate
list.name: registration_plate
